title: List of all Android shared  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android shared  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: Android-Debug-Database
repoList.description: A library for debugging android databases and shared preferences - Make Debugging Great Again

repoList.name: android_dbinspector
repoList.description: Android library for viewing and sharing in app databases.

repoList.name: Android-SocialButtons
repoList.description: A library for easily implementing social login/share buttons

repoList.name: SharedMemory
repoList.description: Share memory across processes without limits.

repoList.name: EasyPrefs
repoList.description: A small library containing a wrapper/helper for the Shared Preferences of android.

repoList.name: AndroidBasicsLibrary
repoList.description: This library offers some barebone code for android common to most applications. It provides simple classes and pre-written functions for - internet access, shared preferences storage and retrieval, image picker and bitmap operations, file read and write, recycler view, image downloading and quick database support

repoList.name: android
repoList.description: Common Utils library is developed to reduce efforts to achieve common features of the android apps. While developing the apps, we realized that we’re coding for many common features in all the apps. For e.g. check the network’s availability, using shared preferences, parsing, etc. And like us, many other android developers might be doing the same. So it needs to be reduced for all to save the development time with ease. This is how an idea popped in our mind, and we decided to develop an SDK which can reduce developers’ time and efforts.

repoList.name: live-preferences
repoList.description: Live Shared Preferences library for Android

repoList.name: FastSave-Android
repoList.description: An Android library for fast and easy access to Android Shared preferences.

repoList.name: SharedPreferenceInspector
repoList.description: Android Library to inspect shared preferences.
